TEXT: At the start of combat, Unknown cards transform into other random cards from the chosen classes that satisfy certain constraints.
At the start of combat, Unknown cards transform into other random cards from ANY other class (other than basic Strikes and Defends) that satisfy certain constraints.
You should never see this. Report to Vex
